artist: Engraver: Francesco Rosaspina; Painter: After Raphael (Raffaello Sanzio or Santi)
description: Saint Cecilia at center holding pipes with various musical instruments at her feet; Saint Paul and Saint John the Apostle at left; Saint Augustine and Mary Magdalene at right; above six angels with music, singing
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscriptions

below image in black: Raffaello Sanzio dip.  Franco Rosaspina d\'o inc. /  SANTA CECILIA, / SANTI PAOLO, GIOANNI, AGOSTINO, E MARIA MADDELENA | on sheet in pencil: 2-253
title: Saint Cecilia, Saints Paul, John, Augustine and Mary Magdalene
